devnet_zero_progress.highlight: Prism: all Beacon chain.md implemented, passing spec tests; awaiting Fusaka stable release
Teku: passing all reference tests except Fork Choice
End of October DevNet Zero timeline considered rushed by most teams
ACD decision on CIP split scheduled for ~October 17th blocks PR merges

spec_changes.highlight: Decision: Add slot to sidecars for DevNet1, keep DevNet0 specs frozen
DevNet0 will have no blobs to avoid sidecar slot issue

trustless_payments_debate.highlight: Core question: Should trustless payments be separate EIP or stay in 7732?
Potuz: Staked builders required for pipelining; removing them requires full redesign
Trustless payments add minimal complexity; main work is staked builder infrastructure
Consensus: Strong out-of-box support for off-protocol bids needed regardless

attestation_container_concern.highlight: GLOS reuses index field for payload status; may require new attestation container

action_items.action: Create PR adding slot field to execution payload sidecars
Create PR proposing new attestation container for GLOS index field usage
Finalize decision on trustless payments inclusion at next ACDC

decisions.decision: DevNet0 specs frozen; slot-in-sidecar deferred to DevNet1
DevNet0 will launch without blobs to simplify initial testing

targets.target: ~October 17th - ACD decision on splitting trustless payments from EIP-7732
End of October - DevNet Zero launch (considered rushed by most teams)
